meanings.definition: Regarded as more sacred or virtuous.
meanings.sent1: The holier book is kept in a special place.
meanings.sent2: She always tries to act holier than others.
meanings.sent3: He felt holier than thou after helping the elderly lady.
meanings.sent4: The holier atmosphere of the church enveloped her.
meanings.sent5: The holier ground of the ancient temple felt peaceful and serene.

meanings.definition: Showing a superior attitude or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her holier tone made others feel small.
meanings.sent2: He often comes across as holier than the rest of us.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave me a holier-than-thou look when I forgot to feed it.
meanings.sent4: The holier students looked down on those who didn't study as hard.
meanings.sent5: His holier demeanor in the meeting annoyed his colleagues.
